original_text: Their fellow Levites were in charge of the treasuries of the house of God and the treasuries for the dedicated things.
korean_text: 레위 사람 중에 아히야는 하나님의 전 곳간과 성물 곳간을 맡았으며

sentences.original_text: Their fellow Levites were in charge of the treasuries of the house of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 동료 레위 사람들은 하나님의 집 보물고를 책임졌으며

sentences.original_text: and the treasuries for the dedicated things.
